article.headline: 3M Co. stock outperforms market on strong trading day
article.body: Shares of 3M Co. MMM, +0.94% rose 2.63% to $166.49 Wednesday, on what proved to be an all-around positive trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index SPX, +0.87% rising 1.74% to 3,419.44 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, +0.56% rising 1.91% to 28,303.46. 3M Co. closed $16.05 below its 52-week high ($182.54), which the company achieved on January 14th. The stock demonstrated a mixed performance when compared to some of its competitors Wednesday, as Amazon.com Inc. AMZN, +3.01% rose 3.09% to $3,195.69, Johnson & Johnson JNJ, +1.39% rose 1.11% to $147.88, and Danaher Corp. DHR, +2.42% rose 1.74% to $222.03. Trading volume (2.2 M) remained 293,172 below its 50-day average volume of 2.4 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights using data from Dow Jones and FactSet. See our market data terms of use.
